li.label: Feeble
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} isnt very strong. {PAWN_possessive} is naturally weaker than most things.

li.label: Weak
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is weak. {PAWN_possessive} is naturally weaker than the average pawn.

li.label: Strong
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is strong. {PAWN_possessive} is naturally stronger than the average pawn.

li.label: Herculean
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is very strong. {PAWN_possessive} is naturally stronger than most things.
